summary: App with customer login and product/admin management; adding extended customer profile fields, a 'hot products' section, and pricing label changes (wholesale -> net rate & MRP).

existing_features.title: Extend the customer profile data model to store phone number, PAN number, and address, and update all related read/write backend APIs and frontend profile setup flow to support these fields.

Add a dedicated admin-managed 'Hot Products' mechanism so admins can mark/unmark products as hot, and update the Home page Hot Products section to display only the admin-marked hot products (instead of selecting the first 4 products).

Replace the existing 'Wholesale' pricing with 'Net Rate' and add a separate 'MRP' price field; update backend product data, admin product editor inputs, and all customer-facing displays and cart/order calculations to use Net Rate as the transactional price while also displaying MRP where appropriate.

new_feature_requests.summary: Extend customer login/registration to collect phone number, PAN number, and address fields.
Add a separate section/compartment to manage and display 'hot products'.
Update pricing fields/labels: change 'wholesale' to use/show 'net rate' and 'MRP'.

If the canister currently preserves state across upgrades, add/adjust conditional migration so existing stored products and user profiles are upgraded to the new schema (defaulting new fields safely) without losing data.

projectName: Extend customer profile fields, add admin-managed Hot Products, and update pricing to Net Rate & MRP
